channel.title: nfs on 开发日志
channel.description: Recent content in nfs on 开发日志

item.title: Nfs
item.description: nfs服务 安装 1 sudo apt-get install nfs-kernel-server 设置导出 1 /home/exports *(rw,nohide,insecure,no_subtree_check,async,no_root_squash) 开启服务 1 sudo /etc/init.d/nfs-kernel-server restart 测试 1 2 sudo mount -t nfs -o nolock,vers=3 127.0.0.1:/home/exports /mnt ls /mnt
